title: The Authority may require rain water pipes to be connected to a drain or sewer through a covered channel formed beneath the public foot path to connect the rain water pipe to the road gutter or in any other approved manner, if not used for rain water harvesting
clause_text: The Authority may require rain water pipes to be connected to a drain or sewer through a covered channel formed beneath the public foot path to connect the rain water pipe to the road gutter or in any other approved manner, if not used for rain water harvesting.
